raw_comment: I noticed that the Women's National Basketball Association and National Basketball Association have the same amount, 83%. I wonder how many of those coaches played the sport? The graph shows the amount of players of color and head-coaches of color. Player or coach.
ace_sentences: I noticed that the Women's National Basketball Association and the National Basketball Association have the same percentage.
I wonder how many of these coaches played basketball.
The graph shows the percentage of players of color.
The graph shows the percentage of head-coaches of color.
A person is either a player or a coach.
